long_description: This rugged cot is designed for years of faithful service with its heavy gauge aluminum frame and robust polyester fabric. Crafted with full 1 1/4-inch square, heavy-duty aluminum tubing and resilient rip-stop polyester fabric. Center of cot is reinforced with an extra panel of fabric for higher strength and resistance to stretching. Each of the three long legs is reinforced with an additional inner tube for longevity and stability. Easy to assemble design folds down quickly and fits into matching polyester carry bag with handles for easy transport. Oversized design fits nearly every camper; handles up to 350 pounds. Handy organizer pouch hangs from side to keep essentials handy.
short_description: This rugged cot is designed for years of faithful service with its heavy gauge aluminum frame and robust polyester fabric.
